name: Nebesia
startIntroPart1: All hail twin queen, Naomi, and Imogen The Magnificent! Mother of all Nebesians.
declaringWar: You are threat to our holy white peace! Should ceased from existence!
attacked: We Nebesians love peace. However, if you seek for a fight we will give you in no time. Prepare to be annihilated!
defeated: Only the death have seen the war ends. Alright, you won this war. But please, take care of our people under your rule.
introduction: Greetings! It's honourable to meet another civilization like you. We hope we can be friends.
afterPeace: War only bring us loss and suffers. We respect our peace treaties, we hope this peace will lasts long.
tradeRequest: We offered you some trade. May it bring goodness to both of us.
